short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Saving and earning with Upromise made easy!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Upromise is a rewards program with a simple purpose: to help families save for college. So far, Upromise members have earned $1.2 billion in rewards, helping millions of families achieve their dreams!

Save your time and money when shopping online, and never miss a cash back rewards opportunity with the Upromise Extension! 

GET CASH BACK REWARDS WHEN SHOPPING ONLINE
Get cash back rewards through thousands of participating retailers with the simple click of a button.  The Upromise Extension notifies you if the site you are visiting offers cash back rewards.

AUTOMATICALLY APPLY COUPON CODES
Receive alerts when valid coupon codes are available and automatically apply the best coupon codes at checkout.

DISCOVER ADDITIONAL WAYS TO GET CASH BACK REWARDS
View more cash back reward opportunities from featured retailers.

By installing the Upromise Browser Extension, you agree to the Upromise Privacy Policy (https://www.prodege.com/privacy-policy), Terms of Use (https://www.prodege.com/terms-of-use/), and Member Agreement (https://www.upromise.com/member-agreement).  You also acknowledge our Advertising Disclosure (https://www.prodege.com/advertising-disclosure/).

When you use Upromise Extension, merchants may pay us affiliate commissions. We share those commissions with our users.
